mapper.sql: id, regOptId, processState, patSign, docSign, directorSign, signTime
mapper.insert: insert into doc_insured_pat_agree (id, regOptId, processState, patSign, docSign, directorSign, signTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{directorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into doc_insured_pat_agree
id,
regOptId,
processState,
patSign,
docSign,
directorSign,
signTime,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{processState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{patSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{docSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{directorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update doc_insured_pat_agree
regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
processState = #{processState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patSign = #{patSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
docSign = #{docSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
directorSign = #{directorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
signTime = #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update doc_insured_pat_agree set regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, processState = #{processState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patSign = #{patSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, docSign = #{docSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, directorSign = #{directorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signTime = #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT m.medicineId id,m.name NAME,m.spec spec,p.priceMinPackage price, 1 type FROM (SELECT * FROM bas_medicine a WHERE a.enable = '1' ${filter} and a.beid = #{beid}) m LEFT JOIN bas_price p ON m.code = p.code and m.beid = p.beid UNION ALL SELECT c.chargeItemId id,c.chargeItemName NAME,c.spec spec,c.price price, 2 type FROM bas_charge_item c WHERE c.enable = '1' ${filter} and c.beid = #{beid};
